trans-unit.source: Provides qualifying information to a callback method when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.PeerNearMeChanged"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações elegíveis para um método de chamada de retorno quando um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.PeerNearMeChanged"> </xref> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of change to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object that has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de alteração para o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto que ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Change types include Peer Added, Peer Deleted, and Peer Updated.
trans-unit.target: Os tipos de alteração incluem ponto a ponto adicionadas, eliminadas ponto a ponto e atualizada do elemento de rede.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType"></xref> object that specifies the type of change to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance that occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType"></xref>objeto que especifica o tipo de alteração para o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância que ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> that has changed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a instância do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> que foi alterada.
